sources.title: Aurich 1988
sources.description: The film class of Lutz Mommartz goes with the rabbit school on Exkursion to Aurich: With Andreas Köpnick, Julian Poensgen, Barbara Küntzel, Bernd Conrad, Hubertus Müll and Josua Vogelbusch How can one-to-one-life to be consolidated, without losing time? The concepts of the protagonists are also to be heard backwards. Even the film cut proves to be helpless. LUTZ MOMMARTZ Eight people are trying to play the movie game, an experiment which resembles an impromptu game. Once the camera is running, the 1 d to 1 life is compressed, as if is necesary to prove more than usual. It's a race to the imagination with time. Mostly we lose the game against the clock and watch only: "Torino ? Milano! ? Milano ? Torino! ? Torino ? Milano! ? " aso.
